page.title: 19Village Amenities
page.content: There is a thriving Social Club in the centre of Witchampton in Ivy House. There is a Post Office and General Stores also in the centre of the village. A garage and service station is situated in Lawrence Lane. The village hall is the centre of many activities including meetings of the W.I., the badminton club, the village playgroup and the youth club. Every Friday a Bingo session is held in the hall. Sports facilities consist of a large field with a pavilion used for cricket and football. Adjoining is an adventure playground and a rifle range there is also a Scout hut used by Cubs and Scouts each week. There are bus services following 4 routes through the area, run by a private company. On the cricket field is an annual Summer Fayre, a well attended major event in the village.
